
comment.body: Remove them, e.g. `##a[href^="http://x.com/intent/tweet/?"]` has a few publicwww hits but no actual use if you visit the pages. Should I spend time to demonstrate for each rules? Better to remove all added `x.com` rules except for those actually used. There rules most affect performance.
